updates.content: Customers are reporting issues while performing requests to our CMA. We are looking into this.

It looks like a problem within our cloudflare workers, but only in some regions of U.S.A.

We have found a temporary way to overcome the issue, while we are investigating more.
Failing builds on netlify could be related to this issue: https://www.netlifystatus.com/incidents/zspkr7fmdhvd

name: Errors while performing requests to our CMA
